en: They met when Cortese guest starred as Ruby on the show 's fourth season .
baseline: 在节目第四季,柯特斯客串扮演鲁比时,他们相遇了。

en: In March 2015 , Padalecki launched his Always Keep Fighting campaign through Represent.com .
baseline: 2015年3月,帕达莱克基通过Represent.com发起了他的“永远保持战斗”运动。

en: For the second campaign in the Always Keep Fighting series in April 2015 , Padalecki partnered with co-star Jensen Ackles to release a shirt featuring both of their faces , to benefit their newly formed joint charitable fund .
baseline: 在2015年4月的Always Keep Fighting系列的第二次竞选中,帕达莱克与联合明星詹森·阿克尔斯合作发行了一张带他们两个面孔的衬衫,以受益于他们新成立的联合慈善基金。

en: Most recently , Padalecki launched a third campaign selling a further 40,000 shirts .
baseline: 最近,帕达莱克基发起了第三个销售40万张衬衫的运动。

en: During San Diego Comic - Con 2015 , more than 6,000 fans surprised Padalecki at the Supernatural panel by holding up candles for him , after having revealed his battle with depression earlier in the year .
baseline: 在2015年圣地亚哥漫画节期间,超过6000名粉丝在超级自然小组中为帕达列克奇展示了自己与抑郁的斗争,并为他展示了蜡烛。

en: According to hagiography , Theodorus was born into a wealthy Christian family and was well educated from a young age .
baseline: 据传记,西奥多拉斯出生在富裕的基督教家庭,从幼年就受过良好教育。
zh: 据传记,西奥多拉斯出生在富裕的基督徒家庭,从小就受过良好教育.
据传记,西奥多拉斯出生于一个富有的基督教家庭,从小就受过良好教育.

en: Although initially denied passage to Tabennese by a Pachomian monk due to his wealthy background , Theodorus opted to follow the visiting monk , and his persistence  paid off .
baseline: 尽管最初由于他的富裕背景而被帕乔米亚修道士拒绝进入塔本尼西亚,但西奥多拉斯选择跟随访问的修道士,他的坚持得到了回报。

en: After Theodorus had been assisting Pachomius at Tabennese for several years following his demotion , Pachomius became very ill and seemed to be on the verge of death .
baseline: 西奥多拉斯在撤离后在塔本尼西斯协助帕古米乌斯的几年后,帕古米乌斯病得很重,似乎在临死的边缘。

en: Although it seems Theodorus practiced complete submission to the new leader of the Koinonia , problems soon arose in several Pachomian monasteries that viewed Horsiesios as a weak leader .
baseline: 尽管西奥多拉斯似乎完全服从了科伊诺尼亚的新领袖,但在一些帕乔米亚修道院中很快就出现了问题,他们认为霍尔西西奥斯是一个弱势的领袖。
zh: 虽然西奥多拉斯似乎practiced完全submissiontothenewleaderoftheKoinonia,但问题很快就在一些帕乔米亚修道院出现,认为Horsiesios是一个弱势领导人。
虽然西奥多拉斯似乎practicedcompletesubmissiontothenewleaderoftheKoinonia,problemssoonaroseinseveralPachomianmonasteriesthatsawHorsiesiosasaweakleader。
